entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
